+1 [Food] from [Farm], [Pasture] and [Camp]
Cost increases by [125] per owned city

name: Fertilizer Breakthrough II
uniques: Project
+1 [Food] from [Farm], [Pasture] and [Camp] for each of these adjacent Improvements
Cost increases by [180] per owned city
Only available <if [Fertilizer Breakthrough I] is constructed>

name: Fertilizer Breakthrough III
uniques: Project
+1 [Food] from [Farm], [Pasture] and [Camp]
Cost increases by [270] per owned city
Only available <if [Fertilizer Breakthrough II] is constructed>

name: Economic Breakthrough I
uniques: Project
+1 [Gold] from [Trading post], [Plantation] and [Customs house] if they are within 1 tile of a [City center]/[Great Improvement]
Cost increases by [125] per owned city

name: Economic Breakthrough II
uniques: Project
+1 Yield from [Trading post], [Plantation] and [Customs house] based on the corresponding [Great Improvement] they are adjacent to
Cost increases by [180] per owned city
Only available <if [Economic Breakthrough I] is constructed>

name: Economic Breakthrough III
uniques: Project
+2 [Gold] from [Trading post], [Plantation] and [Customs house]
Cost increases by [270] per owned city
Only available <if [Economic Breakthrough II] is constructed>

name: Industrial Breakthrough I
uniques: Project
+1 [Production] from [Mine], [Quarry] and [Manufactory] if they are on a Resource Tile
Cost increases by [125] per owned city

name: Industrial Breakthrough II
uniques: Project
+1 [Production] from [Mine], [Quarry] and [Manufactory] if they are on a Hill Tile
Cost increases by [180] per owned city
Only available <if [Industrial Breakthrough I] is constructed>

name: Industrial Breakthrough III
uniques: Project
+2 [Production] from [Mine], [Quarry] and [Manufactory]
Cost increases by [270] per owned city
Only available <if [Industrial Breakthrough II] is constructed>

name: Merchant Faculties I
uniques: Project
[+1 Gold] from every [Merchant]

name: Merchant Faculties II
uniques: Project
[+1 Gold] from every [Merchant]
Only available <if [Merchant Faculties I] is constructed>
Cost increases by [35] per owned city

name: Merchant Faculties III
uniques: Project
[+2 Gold] from every [Merchant]
Only available <if [Merchant Faculties II] is constructed>
Cost increases by [50] per owned city

name: Refining Breakthrough I
uniques: Project
+1 [Gold] and Resource to Improvements built on their proper Strategic resource
Cost increases by [25] per owned city

name: Refining Breakthrough II
uniques: Project
+2 [Gold] and Resource to Improvements built on their proper Strategic resource
Only available <if [Refining Breakthrough I] is constructed>
Cost increases by [35] per owned city

name: Refining Breakthrough III
uniques: Project

Only available <if [Refining Breakthrough II] is constructed>
Cost increases by [50] per owned city

name: Infrastructure Breakthrough I
uniques: Project
[+2 Food] from [Urban District] tiles [in all cities]
[+2 Production] from [Industrial Zone] tiles [in all cities]
[+2 Gold] from [Commercial Center] tiles [in all cities]
Cost increases by [25] per owned city

name: Infrastructure Breakthrough II
uniques: Project
[+2 Food] from [Urban District] tiles [in all cities]
[+2 Production] from [Industrial Zone] tiles [in all cities]
[+2 Gold] from [Commercial Center] tiles [in all cities]
Only available <if [Infrastructure Breakthrough I] is constructed>
Cost increases by [35] per owned city

name: Infrastructure Breakthrough III
uniques: Project
[+2 Food] from [Urban District] tiles [in all cities]
[+2 Production] from [Industrial Zone] tiles [in all cities]
[+2 Gold] from [Commercial Center] tiles [in all cities]
Only available <if [Infrastructure Breakthrough II] is constructed>
Cost increases by [50] per owned city

name: Implants Breakthrough I
uniques: Project
Enables certain Implant Promotions

name: Implants Breakthrough II
uniques: Project
Enables certain Implant Promotions
Only available <if [Implants Breakthrough I] is constructed>

name: Implants Breakthrough III
uniques: Project
All newly-trained [Enhanced Infantry] units [in all cities] receive the [March] promotion
[+15] HP when healing <for [Enhanced Infantry] units>
Only available <if [Implants Breakthrough I] is constructed>
